title: NTabsProps
description: Neuron tabs component for organizing content into switchable panels. Each tab has an associated content area.

id.description: Unique identifier for the tab, used as the tab value.

label.description: Display label for the tab trigger.

tabs.description: Array of tab definitions with id and label.

defaultValue.description: ID of the tab selected by default (uncontrolled mode).

value.description: ID of the currently selected tab (controlled mode).

className.description: Additional CSS class names to apply.
